comment:
* Simple stack for boolean values.
     * 
     * This class is a copy of the one in org.apache.xml.utils. 
     * It exists to cut the serializers dependancy on that package.
     * A minor changes from that package are:
     * doesn't implement Clonable
     *  
     * @xsl.usage internal

variables.name: m_index
variables.comment: Index into the array of booleans

methods.name: public final int size()
methods.comment:
* Get the length of the list.
       *
       * @return Current length of the list

methods.name: public final boolean push(boolean val)
methods.comment: * Pushes an item onto the top of this stack. * * * @param val the boolean to be pushed onto this stack. * @return the item argument.

methods.name: public final boolean pop()
methods.comment:
* Removes the object at the top of this stack and returns that
       * object as the value of this function.
       *
       * @return     The object at the top of this stack.
       * @throws  EmptyStackException  if this stack is empty.

methods.name: public final boolean popAndTop()
methods.comment:
* Removes the object at the top of this stack and returns the
       * next object at the top as the value of this function.
       *
       *
       * @return Next object to the top or false if none there

methods.name: public final void setTop(boolean b)
methods.comment:
* Set the item at the top of this stack  
       *
       *
       * @param b Object to set at the top of this stack

methods.name: public final boolean peek()
methods.comment:
* Looks at the object at the top of this stack without removing it
       * from the stack.
       *
       * @return     the object at the top of this stack.
       * @throws  EmptyStackException  if this stack is empty.

methods.name: public final boolean peekOrFalse()
methods.comment:
* Looks at the object at the top of this stack without removing it
       * from the stack.  If the stack is empty, it returns false.
       *
       * @return     the object at the top of this stack.

methods.name: public final boolean peekOrTrue()
methods.comment:
* Looks at the object at the top of this stack without removing it
       * from the stack.  If the stack is empty, it returns true.
       *
       * @return     the object at the top of this stack.

methods.name: public boolean isEmpty()
methods.comment: * Tests if this stack is empty. * * @return true if this stack is empty; * false otherwise.

methods.name: private void grow()
methods.comment:
* Grows the size of the stack
       *
